name: quick-note
title: Quick Note
description: Adds quick note to the custom markdown file
author: gogamid

commands.name: qq
commands.title: Quicknote
commands.description: Takes user input and appends it to the custom markdown file

preferences.name: filePath
preferences.title: Absolute path to the file
preferences.description: Please enter the absolute path to the file you want to append your note to.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
